_comment: Recommended hooks for saas-toolkit. Copy relevant sections into your project's .claude/settings.json

hooks.command: node -e "const c=JSON.parse(process.argv[1]).input.command; const allowed=[/^npx vitest/,/^npx playwright/,/^npx supabase/,/^npm run/,/^npm audit/,/^stripe /,/^git /,/^npm install/]; if(!allowed.some(r=>r.test(c))){process.exit(2);}"
hooks._description: Restrict Bash to safe commands: test runners, supabase CLI, npm, stripe CLI, git
